name: ravager MK II (unactivated)
description: A form of PCE (proprietary cybernetic equipment), engineered by some of the more insane craftsmen of the Old Guard, rigged specifically for the famous (or infamous) Snow-meow, these powered gauntlets attatch to the arms of any alloy-plated cyborg. When un-activated, they make a great shield but are heavy and unwieldy. Activate to power the unit and transform the weapon into its battery-powered bladed-form.

use_action.msg: You hear a seering hiss as your Ravager MK II roars to life.

name: ravager MK II (activated)
description: A telescoping baton that collapses for easy storage.  Makes an excellent melee weapon.  Activate to collapse.
